## Koatty.stop() method

Stop all servers gracefully. - For single protocol: stops the single server - For multi-protocol: stops all servers sequentially

**Signature:**

```typescript
stop(callback?: () => void): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

callback


</td><td>

() =&gt; void


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional callback function to be executed after all servers stop


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
